author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Viacomâ€™s Hidden Charms May Tempt CBS
text:
If Viacom Inc. and CBS Corp. are to reach a deal, one of the crucial issues they will have to hammer out is how much more Viacom might be worth as part of a merged company.

At only six times trailing earnings, it is even cheaper now than when a deal fell apart in December 2016. Disagreements over valuation were one of the reasons the merger was abandoned: Viacom demanded a premium that CBS chief executive Les Moonves was then unwilling to fork over. Two parts of the business have since become more attractive. Yet their value...
